package.name: signpost
package.summary: Sync your Magento clients to your Signpost account in real time!
package.description: Use our Signpost extension for Magento to sync your Magento clients in real time to your Signpost account. Setup takes 2 minutes, and all syncing is in the background. When a customer signs up in Magento, they will be immediately imported into Signpost for you to being marketing to.
package.notes:
Use our Signpost extension for Magento to sync your Magento clients in real time to your Signpost account. Setup takes 2 minutes, and all syncing is in the background. When a customer signs up in Magento, they will be immediately imported into Signpost for you to being marketing to.
What is Signpost? Signpost is a hands off CRM and automated marketing platform designed to drive the outcomes that matter most to small businesses. Its a Best Market Plans for your Organisations. A new Way to connect to your Customers With Guaranteed Result.
